text: Philip Andre "Mickey" Rourke, Jr. (born September 16, 1952) is an American actor. He is of Irish and French descent. He is a Roman Catholic.Saved He was in the movie "The Wrestler". He also appeared at WrestleMania and had an encounter with Chris Jericho. He also played the voice of Jericho in the Driver 2 video game. == References == Category:Actors from New York (state) Category:American boxers Category:American movie actors Category:American Roman Catholics Category:American screenwriters Category:Sportspeople from New York (state) Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:People from Schenectady, New York Category:Writers from New York City Category:1952 births Category:Living people
title: Mickey Rourke
